src:
Daftar UMP 2020 di DKI Jakarta hingga Sulawesi Selatan
02 Nov 2019, 01:30 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Ilustrasi UMP/Foto: Muhammad Ridho

Jakarta - Pemerintah menetapkan UMP alias Upah Minimum Provinsi (UMP) 2020 naik 8,51%. Kebijakan tersebut mulai diumumkan pemerintah provinsi (Pemprov) mulai 1 November 2019.Sejumlah daerah di Jawa hingga Sulawesi sudah mengumumkan besaran UMP masing-masing. Mulai dari DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, hingga Sulawesi Selatan.Mau tahu daerah mana saja yang sudah mengumumkan UMP 2020? Baca selengkapnya di sini: (kil/hns)
text:
Register for UMP 2020 in DKI Jakarta to South Sulawesi
02 Nov 2019, 01:30 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


UMP Illustration / Photo: Muhammad Ridho

Jakarta - The government set the UMP alias Provincial Minimum Wage (UMP) 2020 up 8.51%. The policy was announced by the provincial government (Pemprov) starting November 1, 2019. A number of regions in Java to Sulawesi have announced their respective UMPs. Starting from DKI Jakarta, West Java, to South Sulawesi. Want to know which areas have announced the UMP 2020? Read more here: (kil / hns)
